html:
though, &c. Quoted inRomans 9:27, Romans 9:28 .

as the sand, &c. Figure of speech Paraemia . Reference to Pentateuch (Genesis 22:17; Genesis 32:12 , &c).

consumption = full end, or finish. Hebrew. killayon. Reference to Pentateuch. Occurs only here, andDeuteronomy 28:65 . App-92.

with = in.
